pages.text: $(li)The Fermented Spider Eye is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/weakness)Potion of Weakness$(/l), $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/harming)Harming$(/l), $(l:patchouli:potions/buzzier_bees/bad_luck)Bad Luck$(/l), $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/slowness)Slowness$(/l), $(l:patchouli:potions/atmospheric/worsening)Worsening$(/l), $(l:patchouli:potions/upgrade_aquatic/insomnia)Insomnia$(/l), $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/invisibility)Invisibility$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:potions/upgrade_aquatic/vibing)Vibing$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).
$(li)It can be used to craft $(l)Magic Beans$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
